thread.title: Nice hotel near Madison Square Garden and Herald Square
thread.title_full: Nice hotel near Madison Square Garden and Herald Square - Review of Kimpton Hotel Eventi, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Walter C
title: Nice hotel near Madison Square Garden and Herald Square
text:
I love Kimpton hotels and this one is good by their standards,
We got there late on a Friday night, and even though it had snowed the week before there was no problem in front of the hotel, the staff were helpful, and the valet parking went easy.
This hotel is close to everything and walkable to all of the hot spots.
The only bummer was that we went down to the bar to get a drink about 12:30 am and they were locking up. But tat just gave us the opportunity to try new stuff in the area!
Room Tip: City View above 16 See more room tips Green Features: Excellent for NYC. Good practices. Typical towel policies
